snippet: Thrive Capital, a venture capital firm run by Joshua Kushner, has raised $150 million for its latest fund as it seeks to become more competitive against larger firms.
abstract: Thrive Capital, a venture capital firm run by Joshua Kushner, has raised $150 million for its latest fund as it seeks to become more competitive against larger firms.

headline.main: Thrive Capital Raises $150 Million Fund, Bolstering Profile
